meanings.definition: The quality of being sticky or adhesive.
meanings.sent1: The glueyness of the tape made it perfect for sticking things together.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the glueyness of the honey as I spread it on my toast.
meanings.sent3: The glueyness of the slime made it fun to play with.
meanings.sent4: The glueyness of the situation made it hard to escape.
meanings.sent5: The glueyness of the spider web caught me by surprise.

meanings.definition: The state of having a thick or viscous consistency.
meanings.sent1: The glueyness of the oatmeal made it hard to stir.
meanings.sent2: The glueyness of the mud made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The glueyness of the pudding made it a challenge to eat with a straw.
meanings.sent4: The glueyness of the traffic jam seemed to slow down time.
meanings.sent5: The glueyness of the paint made it perfect for the art project.
